content: उपसृष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Joined, connected with, accompanied by. {@--2@} Seized or possessed by (a demon or evil spirit). उपसृष्टा इव क्षुद्राधिष्ठितभवनाः <ls>K. 107.</ls> {@--3@} Troubled, affected, injured; रोगोपसृष्टतनुदुर्वसतिं मुमुक्षुः <ls>R. 8. 94</ls>; <ls>K. 289.</ls> {@--4@} Eclipsed. {@--5@} Furnished with an उपसर्ग (as a root); क्रुधद्रुहोरुपसृष्टयोः कर्म <ls>P. I. 4. 38.</ls> --ष्टः The sun or moon when eclipsed. --ष्टं Sexual union.
